>>===== MODE =====>>
citation
<<===== MODE =====<<



>>===== RESULT =====>>
1965年6月1日 + 10月 (Japan)
1 juin 1965 + octobre (France)
June 01, 1965 + October (US English)
1. Juni 1965 + Oktober (Austria)
1. Juni 1965 + Oktober (Austria)
1965年6月1日 + 10月 (Mainland China)
1965年6月1日 + 10月 (Taiwan)
1 de Junho de 1965 + Outubro (Portugal)
1 de Junho de 1965 + Outubro (Portugal)
<<===== RESULT =====<<


>>===== CSL =====>>
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="note"
      version="1.1mlz1">
  <info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>
  <locale xml:lang="de-AT">
    <terms>
      <term name="month-10">Oktober (Austria)</term>
    </terms>
  </locale>
  <locale xml:lang="de-DE">
    <terms>
      <term name="month-10">Oktober (Germany)</term>
    </terms>
  </locale>
  <locale xml:lang="en-US">
    <terms>
      <term name="month-10">October (US English)</term>
    </terms>
  </locale>
  <locale xml:lang="fr-FR">
    <terms>
      <term name="month-10">octobre (France)</term>
    </terms>
  </locale>
  <locale xml:lang="ja-JP">
    <terms>
      <term name="month-10">10月 (Japan)</term>
    </terms>
  </locale>
  <locale xml:lang="pt-BR">
    <terms>
      <term name="month-10">outubro (Brazil)</term>
    </terms>
  </locale>
  <locale xml:lang="pt-PT">
    <terms>
      <term name="month-10">Outubro (Portugal)</term>
    </terms>
  </locale>
  <locale xml:lang="zh-CN">
    <terms>
      <term name="month-10">10月 (Mainland China)</term>
    </terms>
  </locale>
  <locale xml:lang="zh-TW">
    <terms>
      <term name="month-10">10月 (Taiwan)</term>
    </terms>
  </locale>
  <macro name="cite">
    <group delimiter=" ">
      <names variable="author">
        <name />
      </names>
      <date variable="issued" form="text" date-parts="year-month-day"/>
    </group>
    <text term="month-10" prefix=" + "/>
  </macro>
  <citation>
    <layout locale="ja" delimiter="&#x0A;">
      <text macro="cite"/>
    </layout>
    <layout locale="fr" delimiter="&#x0A;">
      <text macro="cite"/>
    </layout>
    <layout locale="de-AT de" delimiter="&#x0A;">
      <text macro="cite"/>
    </layout>
    <layout locale="at" delimiter="&#x0A;">
      <text macro="cite"/>
    </layout>
    <layout locale="pt" delimiter="&#x0A;">
      <text macro="cite"/>
    </layout>
    <layout locale="zh-CH" delimiter="&#x0A;">
      <text macro="cite"/>
    </layout>
    <layout locale="zh-TW" delimiter="&#x0A;">
      <text macro="cite"/>
    </layout>
    <layout delimiter="&#x0A;">
      <text macro="cite"/>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>
